de.bfs.radon.omsimulation.data

Class OMRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bfs.radon.omsimulation.data.OMRoom

  • public class OMRoom
extends java.lang.Object
    Public class OMRoom, defining the important attributes for the room objects which are required for OMBuildings and OMCampaigns later.
    Author:
    A. Schoedon

    • Constructor Detail

      • OMRoom

        public OMRoom(java.lang.String id,
      double[] values)
        Constructor for objects of the class OMRoom. Creates rooms using an unique ID and a set of radon values.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the room which is used to parse the type. For example: R1 for normal rooms, C1 for cellars or M1 for miscellaneous rooms.
        values - An array of radon values for the certain room. Each value[i] equals the average of one hour. The unit is [Bq/m^3].

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public OMRoomType getType()
        Gets the type of the room: Normal, Cellar, Misc.
        Returns:
        the type of the room.

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Gets the unique ID of the room which is used to parse the type.
        Returns:
        The unique ID of the room which is used to parse the type.

      • setId

        public void setId(java.lang.String id)
        Sets the unique ID of the room. In Addition, this will parse and update the type.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the room which is used to parse the type.

      • getValues

        public double[] getValues()
        Gets an array of radon values for the certain room. Each value[i] equals the average of one hour. The unit is [Bq/m^3].
        Returns:
        An array of radon values for the certain room.

      • setValues

        public void setValues(double[] values)
        Sets an array of radon values for the certain room. Each value[i] equals the average of one hour. After setting new values, all attributes of the room object will be re-calculated and updated again.
        Parameters:
        values - An array of radon values for the certain room.

      • getCount

        public int getCount()
        Gets the total number of measurements for the room. The unit is [h].
        Returns:
        The total number of measurements for the room.

      • getAverage

        public double getAverage()
        Gets the arithmetic average of all values. The unit is [Bq/m^3].
        Returns:
        The arithmetic average of all values.

      • getMaximum

        public double getMaximum()
        Gets the highest value out of all measurements. The unit is [Bq/m^3].
        Returns:
        The highest value out of all measurements.

      • getDeviation

        public double getDeviation()
        Gets the standard deviation of all values. The unit is [Bq/m^3].
        Returns:
        The standard deviation of all values.

      • calculateAttributes

        public void calculateAttributes()
        Calls the setters for the attributes Count, Median, Maximum and Deviation to re-calculate and update them. Call this method always after changes to the radon values. Note: It's not needed to call this after using the OMRoom.setValues() method as modifying values using the setter always triggers the re-calculation of attributes on its own.
